words.name: culpable
words.means: deserving blame or censure as being wrong or injurious

words.name: loathsome
words.means: highly offensive; arousing aversion or disgust

words.name: gaunt
words.means: very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold

words.name: hijab
words.means: a headscarf worn by Muslim women

words.name: coup
words.means: a sudden and decisive change of government by force

words.name: freeware
words.means: software that is provided without charge

words.name: shareware
words.means: software that is available free of charge; may be distributed for evaluation with a fee requested for additional features or a manual etc

words.name: upgrade
words.means: software that provides better performance than an earlier version did

words.name: bitcoin
words.means: a system of open source peer-to-peer software for the creation and exchange of (payment in) a certain type of cryptocurrency; the first such system to be fully functional

words.name: bite
words.means: To cut, grip, or tear with or as if with the teeth

words.name: offspring
words.means: A child or children of a parent or parents
